name: Soccer Eleven Manager
description:
Welcome to Soccer Eleven 19! The new fast-peaced football manager with the best soccer action. Collect, play, win, upgrade your team to be the best football manager and prepare for the next match training and enhancing your foot Stars. Open packs to get the most popular football players and win coins to train them.

Play and collect in this soccer game for the most soccer fans. Would you like to have in your team the best players in the world? Open packs to win amazing players and manage your fantasy team and tactics to win your opponent scoring goals with your favourite striker.

**DIVISIONS**

10 Divisions - Try your best eleven to go up in the rankings and play your best tactics to earn coins. Score and win the match!

**PACKS**

Open packs to win football champions and line them up to improve your eleven. There is a bunch of players to collect!

**REAL MATCHES**

Play against other soccer eleven teams and prove that you are the best coach and manager.

Build up your Dream Team with the ultimate manager game, your rivals are waiting for your perfect eleven!
